name: CircleFire
description:
A short top-down shooter tower defense game where you play as a circle escaping through different levels. You have the ability to upgrade many elements of the game including your creeps and yourself. As the rounds progress the enemy places towers and you must battle against them, destroying them to earn coins. There are currently 4 levels but I plan to add more in the future.

Controls:
Use left mouse to shoot.
Hold right mouse to move.
